info.desc: Colony is C++ class library targeted specifically for embedded development.  Colony.Core is the base system/interfaces for the Colony packages.

current.comment: Minor updates, bug fixes, and transition to git actions
current.changes:
"- Add additional Atomic operations to the MP interface
- Minor bug fixes to trace statements
- Transition to git actions for CI
- Update copyright statements"

history.comment: Refactor TShell and MApp - breaking change
history.changes:
"Breaking Change:
- Refactor TShell and MApp for smaller memory footprint

Maintenance:
- SList: prevent potential stack overflow
- Document necessary edits to the Little FS repo (when using the Microsoft compiler)
- Prevent fatal-error-infinite-loop when a unit test failure occurs
- Fix race condition on UART driver
- Fix bug in the BitArray base class"

history.comment: Add support for Littlefs
Migrate to Catch2 v3.x test framework (now uses a static library instead of single header file)
Add support for the 'littlefs' file system
Minor updates and add FDictionary class
fix timer issue
minor updates to the tca scripts
Updates from the EPC repo
Migrate to STM32 as the default target platform
history.changes:
"- Updated to newer version of NQBP2 for STM32 toolchains
- Added STM32F413ZH as the 'default' target platform
- Added stream IO/driver for the STM32F MCU (works with/for other STM32x MCUs)
- Adopted the gcc toolchain for STM32 MCUs
- Adopted stm32 SDKs for the F4 and F7 families of MCU
- Deprecated the RX62N platform
- Move the BSP Package into the colony core (i.e. the BSP package has been deprecated)
- Added the 'Micro Application' framework (Cpl::MApp)
- Updated the freertos package to 10.4.3-LTS-Patch-1 (and added support for Seggers' SystemView)"

history.comment: Switch to NQBP GEN2 build engine
Maintainence (Stack, ElapsedTime, RingBuffer, etc.) and minor features add (logging framework, base64 encoding, etc.)
history.changes:
"- Refactor Stack container to be able to support ITEMs that are not numeric types
- Refactor the ElapsedTime implementation so as to provide a default implementation for all platforms (and correct bugs when number of seconds exceed 47 days)
- Refactor the TLS class to not use virtual method (not needed for the interface semantics)
- Add integer and real number expression parsers
- Update BetterEnum to support smaller memory footprint. 
- Add a Restartable wrapper to the TShell
- Add a BlockEncoder
- Update Checksum interface to take a const buffer source. 
- Add a getStream() method to the File InputOutput interface
- misc clean-up
- add logging framework. 
- Add LargeInteger math. 
- Safer RingBuffer. 
- Specify correct abstract type for an 'event loop' mailbox reference. 
- Add support for base64 encoding
"

history.comment: Fix Tshell 'help text' errors introduced is previous update
history.changes:
"- Correct stupid clone-n-edit mistakes in the TShell commands.
- Add unit test to catch the above tshell errors in the future
- And new 'wait' tshell command.
- Clean up the 'wifi' tshell command

"

history.comment: Minor bug fix/clean-up to the TShell
history.changes:
"- Fix bug where the quote/escape characters where not being set correctly for the TShell Maker objects. 
- Clean-up help strings 
- Make base TShell command security aware
"

history.comment: Feature adds to TShell, Data model, and enable default constructors for BETTER_ENUMs
history.changes:
"Add unit test for the Wifi-Station interface (though no concrete impl in colony.core)
Enable default constructors for BETTER_ENUMs
TShell refactored to support user login and three permission levels
Add 'settling-time' feature to the Data Model's Persistent Records
Refactor Data Model Array MPs (array MPs are now typed ONLY by their element type)
Refactor String MPs (String MPs are now a single type)
Add readAndSync() and isNotInvalidAndSync() method to properly synchronous Observers when the MP data is read in the change notification callback
"

history.comment: Add additional driver support and non-blocking TCP socket streams
history.changes:
"- Add interface for WIFI Station functionality
- Add the ability to read 'out-of-band' input in the command shell.
- Add additional JSON support.
- Add Nvram driver interface.
- Add I2C platform independent interface definition.
- Add support for CAT24C512 EEPROM.
- Add non-blocking TCP socket interface and Win32 implementation
"

history.comment: Minor bug fixes and external package updates
history.changes:
"- Fix bug in the missing 'blocking' argument for the frame decoders
- Fix issue of the Cpl::Io::Stream available() method reporting  mouse/focus events for stdin under Windoze
- Get the latest package version of: nqbp, colony.bsp, and colony.bsp.renesas.rx
"

history.comment: Added new Drivers. Tweaked the StreamDecoder. Added VS solution. Added Null Media and RAM IO stream
Add Periodic Scheduler. Add non-blocking TShell processor
Refactor Model Points for smaller footprint (is a breaking change)
Try again at publishing as a Outcast2 package
Initial publish as a Outcast2 package
